Better Rolls for Spaceships and Starwyrm: Better Rolls for Spaceships and Starwyrms
brSnS.migrating: Applying Better Rolls System Migration for version {version}
brSnS.rollButtonsEnabled.name: Add Extra Roll Buttons to Sheet
brSnS.rollButtonsEnabled.hint: Adds buttons to items, spells, and features in the sheet, which display when the item is expanded. May be incompatible with the Item Sheet Buttons mod. Requires reopening the sheet.
brSnS.imageButtonEnabled.name: Make Item Image Auto-roll
brSnS.imageButtonEnabled.hint: When clicking on an item's image, output a Better Roll message to chat instead of the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.
brSnS.quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.nam: Quick Roll Description Enabled by Default
brSnS.quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.hin: If enabled, weapons and tools will have their descriptions show by default on quick rolls. Only affects new weapons and tools, as other item types already have descriptions enabled by default.
brSnS.defaultRollArt.name: Actor Roll Image Used
brSnS.defaultRollArt.hint: Determines which art is used by default for ability checks and saving throws. If this is not available (or is the default mystery man icon), it will use the other icon instead.
brSnS.damageContextEnabled.name: Damage Context Labels
brSnS.damageContextEnabled.hint: Allows entering context for damage labels, which precede the damage type. Only works on Better Rolls.
brSnS.contextReplacesTitle.name: Context Replaces Title Label
brSnS.contextReplacesTitle.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage roll's title label, such as "Damage" or "Healing", it will replace it.
brSnS.contextReplacesDamage.name: Context Replaces Damage Type
brSnS.contextReplacesDamage.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage type label, it will replace it.
brSnS.rollTitlePlacement.name: Show Roll Title Labels
brSnS.rollTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a non-damage roll's title, such as "Attack", appear.
brSnS.damageTitlePlacement.name: Show Damage Title Labels
brSnS.damageTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a damage roll's title, such as "Damage", appears.
brSnS.damageContextPlacement.name: Show Damage Context Labels
brSnS.damageContextPlacement.hint: Determines if and where a damage roll's context label appears.
brSnS.damageRollPlacement.name: Show Damage Type Labels
brSnS.damageRollPlacement.hint: Determines where the damage type label is placed, relative to a damage roll.
brSnS.altSecondaryEnabled.name: Alt-Click Image for Secondary Roll
brSnS.altSecondaryEnabled.hint: When Alt-clicking on an item's image, output a second Better Roll message which can be configured separately per-item. Overwrites ability to bypass with default chat output.
brSnS.playRollSounds.name: Enable Roll Sounds
brSnS.playRollSounds.hint: Plays a dice-rolling sound when a Better Rolls message is sent to chat. Wlll not play if Maestro's Item Track are enabled.
brSnS.hideDC.name: Hide Save DCs
brSnS.hideDC.hint: Determines if the DC is hidden on save DC buttons on Better Rolls.
brSnS.damagePromptEnabled.name: Damage Button In Chat Card
brSnS.damagePromptEnabled.hint: Do not autoroll damage, instead show a damage button if there is an attack roll or saving throw.
brSnS.d20RollIconsEnabled.name: Show D20 die icon
brSnS.d20RollIconsEnabled.hint: If enabled, attacks, checks, and saves show natural die roll
brSnS.applyActiveEffects.name: Show DAE Active Effects Button
brSnS.applyActiveEffects.hint: Show button to apply active effects. The DAE module is required. If DAE is not installed, this option will not do anything.
brSnS.d20Mode.name: d20 Mode
brSnS.d20Mode.hint: Determines how attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws are shown. If set to Single Roll, also enables [-]/[+] roll overlay buttons for advantage and disadvantage.
brSnS.d20Mode.choices.1: Single Roll Upgradeable (Shift Adv, Ctrl Disadv)
brSnS.d20Mode.choices.3: ゴゴ Triple Threat ゴゴ
brSnS.critBehavior.name: Critical Damage Behavior
brSnS.critBehavior.hint: Determines how critical damage is calculated. Currently, all base formula maximization is added mathematically to the critical damage segment.
brSnS.critBehavior.choices.4: Max Base Damage, Roll Critical Damage
brSnS.critString.name: Critical Indicator
brSnS.critString.hint: Determines how criticals are labeled. Appears as text to the right of the critical damage roll. Only works on Better Rolls.

brSnS.chatDamageButtonsEnabled.name: Enable Apply Damage Buttons
brSnS.chatDamageButtonsEnabled.hint: Renders buttons on Better Rolls damage rolls that apply damage to selected tokens. Requires refreshing Foundry.

brSnS.error.noSelectedActor: Must have a character selected to use this macro!
brSnS.error.noKnownItemOnActor: does not own an item named
brSnS.error.noActorWithId: No actor is known with that ID
brSnS.error.noActorWithName: No actor is known with that name
brSnS.error.noItemWithId: No item is known with that ID on actor
brSnS.error.noChargesLeft: This item has run out of charges!
brSnS.error.autoDestroy: The {name} disappears as its last charge is consumed.
brSnS.error.noDAE: DAE is required to apply active effects to targets
brSnS.error.libWrapperMinVersion: Better Rolls requires libWrapper version {version} or newer.
brSnS.error.noVersatile: Attempt to roll versatile damage when none was set
brSnS.settings.critDamage.name: Extra Critical Damage
brSnS.settings.critDamage.hint: Extra Critical Damage to apply when at least one damage is rolled
brSnS.settings.quickRollsAltSubLabel: (When holding Alt during a quick roll)
brSnS.settings.label: Label
brSnS.querying.title: What type of roll?

brSnS.chat.damageButtons.fullDamage.hint: Click to apply full damage to selected token(s).
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.quarterDamage.hint: Click to apply quarter damage to selected token(s).
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.halfDamage.hint: Click to apply half damage to selected token(s).
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.doubleDamage.hint: Click to apply double damage to selected token(s).
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.healing.hint: Click to apply full healing to selected token(s).
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.tempOverwrite.title: Overwrite Temporary Health
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.tempOverwrite.content: Replace {original} temporary health with {new} new temporary health?
brSnS.chat.damageButtons.critPrompt.title: Use Crit Damage?
